name: foehn-design-system
description: One place for service teams to find styles, components and patterns for designing government services.
author: Direction générale du numérique et des systèmes d'information

scripts.import:fontawesome: echo "[ Copying Fontawesome in public/ folder ]" && cp -R node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/ public/fontawesome/
scripts.import:foehn: echo "[ Copying Foehn in public/ folder]" && cp -R node_modules/@dsivd/foehn/dist/assets/ public/foehn/
scripts.import:assets: echo "[ Copying documentation assets in public/ folder ]" && cp -R src/assets public/assets
scripts.lint: echo "[ Linting and reformating files ]" && npx prettier --write .
scripts.prebuild: run-p clean:* && npm run mkdir:public && run-p import:* && npm run lint && npm run styles
